problem.title: CheckPoint: Moving on a circle
problem.script:
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
a=lc_random(1,3,1) b=lc_random(1,4,1) c=lc_random(1,3,1) m=lc_choose(a,2,10,25) r=lc_choose(b,0.6, 3, 12, 40) T=lc_choose(c,4,12,45) vt= math.pi*2* r/ T a= vt* vt/ r F= m* a
problem.p: An object of mass $m kg is moving at a constant speed in a circle of radius $r m. The period of revolutions (the time it takes to complete one revolution) is $T s.
